list_definition.definition: (the act of) thinking about something, especially the needs or feelings of other people

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He stayed at home out of consideration for his mother.

list_definition.definition: a fact to be taken into account in making a decision etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The cost of the accommodation is our main consideration.
